title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Get Limited-Time Drift Liveries
content:
Put your drifting skills to work and get rewarded with wraps. Complete any Drift Race to receive the bold Painted n’ Shaded drift livery for the RUNE Cheburek (Sports Classic, 30% off) — an illustrated look for this throwback from behind the Iron Curtain.

Take on a Drift Race in the Dinka Jester RR (Sports) to unlock the aggressive Drift Gorilla Green drift livery, designed to stand out on track and in traffic. Drift liveries with be awarded within 72 hours of completion.
